mapper.insert: insert into `mall` (sn, name, state, longiAndLatitude, address, describe, picture, logo, officeTime, openingTime, remark) values (#{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{longiandlatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openingtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update `mall` set sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, longiAndLatitude = #{longiandlatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, officeTime = #{officetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openingTime = #{openingtime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select id, sn, name, state, longiAndLatitude, address, describe, picture, logo, officeTime, openingTime, remark from `mall` where id = #{id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
select id, sn, name, state, longiAndLatitude, address, describe, picture, logo, officeTime, openingTime, remark from `mall`
